headline: Harmonic (HLIT) Surpasses Q2 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Harmonic (HLIT) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +200.00% and +6.01%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Corning (GLW) To Report Earnings Tomorrow: Here Is What To Expect
summary: Glass and electronic component manufacturer Corning (NYSE:GLW) will be reporting earnings this Tuesday before market open. Here’s what to look for.
